author: julianfoad
msg: Modifications to the book.
Patch contributed by Francois Beausoleil.  This closes issue 1187.
* doc/book/book/appa.xml:
Updated the section about the status codes to show the most common ones.
Added reference to other sections for more details.
Left in a comment about the CVS update codes discussions that should
be moved elsewhere.

author: sergeyli
msg: * subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/davautocheck.sh
File moved. Added description and usage instructions.
Changed paths to accomodate the script at the new location.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/ra_dav.h
(svn_ra_dav__xml_elm_t, svn_ra_dav__xml_validate_cb,
svn_ra_dav__xml_startelm_cb, svn_ra_dav__xml_endelm_cb,
svn_ra_dav__xml_push_handler): add documentation.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/util.c
(lookup_elem, shim_startelm, shim_cdata, shim_endelm): add documentation.

author: kfogel
msg: Fix issue #1313: Copying between two different repositories gave an
incomprehensible error message.
* subversion/libsvn_client/copy.c
(repos_to_repos_copy): Detect the condition and produce a better
error message.

author: sussman
msg: Pool correctness fix, part of solving issue 1319 ("wonky merge conflicts").
* libsvn_client/diff.c (merge_dir_added): it's all fine and dandy that
svn_client_copy adds the new directory's access-baton to the
parent's associated set, but use a *real* pool to do so, not a
subpool that is destroyed at the end of the function!

author: kfogel
msg: * www/project_status.html: Note that 0.27 is code complete and
awaiting release.
